snippets.name: migxSaveOption
snippets.description: After save hook that gets and sets the group (parent) ID inside a nested MIGXdb configuration. Also generates an alias if none is present and increments the sort order.

snippets.name: migxSaveOptionGroup
snippets.description: After save hook for MIGXdb that updates the key in child options too if you change it. Also increments the sort order.
